title: My Tribe - New Strategy Game [h33t][Wendy99]
description:
My Tribe - Like Virtual Villagers Sim Game 

Shipwrecked on a beautiful tropical island, your brave little 

tribespeople must build a new home! With your guidance, the tribe will 

uncover mysterious secrets, research new technologies, and construct 

massive wonders! Come back often to feed your tribe, clothe them, and 

look after the babies and children!

Features:
* Real-time gameplay!
* Your tribe is alive, even when your computer is turned off!
* Tribespeople will grow up, learn new skills, and have children of 

their own.
* Tons of different hair styles and hair colors.
* Design your own clothing colors, and choose from 18 style 

combinations!
* Literally billions of islands to explore!
* Each island is unique, and has a variety of mysterious objects to 

solve!
* If your tribe is prosperous, they can travel to new islands.
* An endless number of possibilities -- the fun will never stop!
* Design your own paradise!

System Requirements:
* Windows 95/98/2000/ME/XP/Vista
* 600MHz or faster processor
* 256MB RAM
* 59MB hard drive space

THANKS TO TAC-CM
